definitions.text: the state of being free from danger or injury
examples: we support the armed services in the name of national security

definitions.text: defense against financial failure; financial independence
examples: his pension gave him security in his old age
insurance provided protection against loss of wages due to illness
the watch dog gave her a feeling of security

definitions.text: a formal declaration that documents a fact of relevance to finance and investment; the holder has a right to receive interest or dividends
property that your creditor can claim in case you default on your obligation
examples: bankers are reluctant to lend without good security

definitions.text: a department responsible for the security of the institution's property and workers
examples: the head of security was a former policeman

definitions.text: a guarantee that an obligation will be met
an electrical device that sets off an alarm when someone tries to break in
measures taken as a precaution against theft or espionage or sabotage etc.
examples: military security has been stepped up since the recent uprising
